website_summaries.verdict: Jabra can't make up for mediocre sound performance, even with the unique, handy heart rate monitor built into its gym-friendly Sports Pulse Wireless Bluetooth earphones.
pros: App offers useful features for workouts
cons: Sound profile lacks a sense of warmth or bass presence

customer_reviews.title: Repeated failures
customer_reviews.text: The product was purchased and worked perfectly fine for 2 months. At that point, the product would lose its charge completely. I would charge the product for hours on end, yet the device would never turn on. I contacted Jabra Support, and a replacement pair was sent to me. After two months with the new pair, I had the same problem of the headphones not holding a charge. I contacted Jabra support for a second time, and a second replacement pair was sent to me. This pair lasted me another 2-3 months until the product died again. This product clearly has some repeated faults, and the supplier was supportive by providing replacements. I gave it 1-star due to its reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Defective!
customer_reviews.text: Purged because I was looking for a robust wireless headphones. Was excited when it arrived. Plugged to charge battery, followed directions and connection to Bluetooth device failed. Tried multiple times with no luck. Called their tech support only to find out item was defective. Device light should show red when charging, green when fully charged and blue when trying to connect with automated voice directions to assist with connection. This device showed red and green when connected to charger but nothing when unplugged. Tech support recommended returning to Amazon for replacement. Received replacement with same issue. RETURNED!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but!
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of having a heart rate monitor in the headphones. The power used to keep this going does not allow the advertised 4 hour of use. Mine didn't even make it to 2.
customer_reviews.author: alex santos

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could recommend these, but I can't.
customer_reviews.text: Agree with all of the 2 and 1 star raters here. These headphones crap out after about a month. Work great for a while, and then go on the fritz "disconnected/connected" constantly (my first pair) and then the on-the-go updates started to repeat over and over (2nd pair) -- both instances mid-jog, of course. I switched to the Bluebuds X but it's a poor compromise, as the Jabras fit MUCH better and that heart rate monitor was a real selling point. Can't really see myself buying a third pair until I read that Jabra has worked out their colossally flawed software.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Y. Bice

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased headphones in February 2015, now on my 3rd set. Works great for about 2 to 3 weeks, then battery issues (never over charged, updated firmware) claimed the first set. The second set had issues with the volume and multi-function buttons, then a few days later it stopped working all together. Received 3rd set from company and this time, nothing works, completely dead. Called Jabra's customer service yet again, and spoke to a supervisor. Was told my case would be escalated. Waiting for response. I do like the idea of being wireless and the heart monitor built in...when it works! Save your money, not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Songgi D Kim

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good while they worked
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 2 months. Then they stopped turning on or if I could get them on they would not turn off. I contacted the company for a replacement being that it was past 30 days to get a refund from amazon. Sound quality is slightly less then the apple earbuds that came with my iphone. I feel like this earbuds should be priced around 100 not the 197 I paid for them (March 2015) I hope the new pair they are sending me will last longer then these did.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend. I am 51 and have had no problems ...
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend. I am 51 and have had no problems at all with setting up the earphones and using the application. I use them with Spotify and they work great, able to go forward and backwards with my songs by pressing the earplugs. I run about 50 minutes a day and I am able to get 4 runs in before recharging. Recharging is no big deal; just plug into USB port on computer. Was able to easily fit the earplugs into my ear, you have about 4 different choices. They fit in fine and I had no real adjustment to wearing them. I finally can run and listen to music without that darn cord.
customer_reviews.author: Lor Lor

customer_reviews.title: Third time is not the charm.
customer_reviews.text: The Jabra Sport Pulse only worked for a very short time. The green light would turn on while charging but when unplugged the device would not power on. I contacted customer support and gladly they sent me another device. This one behaved like the first and stopped working pretty quickly. Again I contacted customer support and they sent me another one. This one, surprise, surprise, has stopped working as well. I now have three sets of headphones sitting useless in a drawer. You would think a $200 pair of headphones would last longer than they did.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Jabra Sport Pulse has no Pulse!
customer_reviews.text: This is so frustrating! Within 5 months of use these will no longer hold a charge, let alone even charge. The red light remains on during the charging process. Customer service indicated the best thing to do is to send them back. Clearly a challenge when I use these weekly. The fit is amazing, not too bulky on the ears, but at the end of the day I can't recommend this item if you will need to replace them within 5 months. They tell me once I send to customer service I should see a response within 7 days. We will see...
customer_reviews.author: MIslander

customer_reviews.title: WON'T POWER AFTER CHARGE!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the product and charged it before usage... got the green light... disconnected... tried to pair it and would not power 💪 up after 1hr of trying everything possible. Called Amazon and so you know what happened next... FULL REFUND! What happened to Jabra?! By the way, this is the second item from Jabra that I am returning because of faulty issues with the hardware. I would not recommend it to anyone. Do yourself a favor and look somewhere else because you would just be wasting your money just like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S.

customer_reviews.title: Way more accurate than a smartwatch
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome. I got mine refurbished and i do not regret it. I wish the ear wings were a bit more comfortable but other than that they do what they are supposed to. I feel like i can accurately track my heart rate instead of messinga round with a smartwatch.
customer_reviews.author: Eleuterio Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality: exceptionally bad. Sound volume: Music... very low. Alerts, defenning Heart rate monitor... if you like having the sound of "disconnected" & "connected" repeated over and over during your workouts... it's for you. Drops frequently.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Fully charged but can’t even turn it on This is trash Battery can’t charge but they charged me 10% restocking fee WTF
customer_reviews.author: Emerald

customer_reviews.title: Even the Jabra Fitness app is pretty impressive. My only complaint is that the reception ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with these headphones, I've used them frequently over the last 4 months and they do not fall out, hold a charge very well, and accurately track my heart rate. Even the Jabra Fitness app is pretty impressive. My only complaint is that the reception can cut in and out especially while turning my head. I've tried the accessories to secure the cord but it isn't effective. Even with this issue I would still buy these headphones again because of the impressive heart rate tracking, sound quality, and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S

customer_reviews.title: 1+ month and Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed, worked fine and then after a month, just stopped, and now I'm out of the return window. As before, pretty disappointed as these are not on the cheap side of wireless buds.
customer_reviews.author: Samia Khan

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is great. My only complaint has been dropping BT pairing ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had these buds now 3 years. I'm not sure of all the negative reviews but mine are used daily for listening and working out. Never had an issue with them. Battery life is great. My only complaint has been dropping BT pairing but that may be my phone. I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Sincerely

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry and great sound
customer_reviews.text: These are little work horses. They have great sound, and fit VERY comfortably. This is a second set.
customer_reviews.author: Herb

customer_reviews.title: Worked quite well until it didn't
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, these stopped working only after a few months. They will 'charge' (red LED indicator is on) but no longer power on. I tried resetting them by holding all sorts of key combinations but nothing brought these back to life. I have not yet contacted Jabra for a warranty replacement. HR is reliable and works well with Runkeeper. Sound is missing a little bass but is not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Olaf P

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - Just Don't Sweat on It
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The heart rate monitor works well, it fits well, the sound quality is good, the bluetooth works as expected. The trouble is that if you sweat as you work out (as I imagine most people do), it will short out almost immediately. I have had these replaced 4 times by Jabra, the last time the unit stopped working in the middle of my 3rd or 4th workout. Thanks to Amazon's stellar customer service, I was eventually able to get a refund. I would recommend avoiding this product. Kudos to Amazon! Boo to Jabra for this major design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Talkincat

customer_reviews.title: Connect it before use
customer_reviews.text: Battary life is short And it’s easy to lose it Hope there new products getting better
customer_reviews.author: Emerald

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about those earphones, but they are terrible. They keep disconnecting, the Bluetooth never pairs with my iPhone and discharges very, very fast. And the worst part, it supposed to help me do my exercises, but it is compromising my exercise routine as I can ever count on having music to listen. Besides that it is not charging anymore, I bought those phones in early October, and we are only in December, and they are already useless. It impressed me how many people have given this product a 5-star rating even with so many complaints about its functionality. 5-stars are for perfect products. This one should be taken out of the market for improvements, lots of them.
customer_reviews.author: publiomadruga

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound and the fitment of the headphones but ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound and the fitment of the headphones but surprised at how terrible the range is. If I put my phone in my left pocket the sound will continually cut out. Your music device has to be on the right hand side of you and close. Other than that the product works and sounds well.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M Cerbone

customer_reviews.title: Solid bluetooth sport headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit of these headphones and the quality of sound. The heart rate seems to be very close to other monitors I have worn at the same time. The call control is simple, as is volume and forwarding/reversing music. I use these on the treadmill and have no problems until I get super sweaty - the ear buds want to slip out. Yes, it would be nice if they had a longer battery life (hence 4 star rating) but they meet my needs at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it should be better but then I have never ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my bike rides. When I place my phone in my middle pocket of my riding jersey, the signal cuts out. The receiver is less than two feet away and there is nothing to speak of in the way with the exception of the material that the jersey is made from. Seems like it should be better but then I have never had good look with bluetooth connection as a whole. The Heart rate monitor seems to work as advertised, which was the main reason for my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are great for biking and hiking providing a comfortable two-for-one option ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these (my dog got ahold of the first pair). They are great for biking and hiking providing a comfortable two-for-one option to listen to music and track heart rate during a workout (WAYYYY more comfortable than a chest strap).
customer_reviews.author: ajay

customer_reviews.title: Battery keeps dying. Loose earphones
customer_reviews.text: Battery keeps dying after I charge it. I charge it for more than 3 hours and it still won't finish charging. I turn on the headphone and connect it to my phone. The battery life says it's fully charged, but when I turn it off and try turning it back on the next day, it's completely dead again. I also experience issues with the headphones remaining in my ear while running.
customer_reviews.author: Tong

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones, just wish they had the software support for windows phone for the heart monitor. I also would have like the magnet feature like that of the Jabra Rox. The earwings are less likely to fall off on this model, the sound quality is very good and overall these earbuds are tough.
customer_reviews.author: mysteriousplayer

customer_reviews.title: Playback and features awesome, microphone quality is horrible
customer_reviews.text: Wow, amazing music sound quality with excellent bass once you get the buds to seal in your ear - which isn't hard to do. Heart rate monitor works well and is picked up by Strava. I've ran and mountain biked with these and they DO NOT fall out. Really nice design. One major flaw however (reason for dropping a star) is the quality of the microphone audio - it's low bandwidth, garbled and any surrounding noise will make your voice indistinguishable to your caller from those around you. Jabra, you had the same problem with the Sport+ bluetooth headphones. When are you going to address this!!??
customer_reviews.author: Matt Berry

customer_reviews.title: great fit, great sound, bpm data!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit of these over all other brands and I love the british female voice that tells me my heart rate when I workout. The sound is as great as you can expect from a bluetooth connection and slightly louder when using Jabra's music app but not worth the extra effort and storage space to use it.
customer_reviews.author: W. J. HALL

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Prone to interference, still choppy audio, updated firmware, uninstalled and re-paired. I'm back to my bose cables.
customer_reviews.author: FlyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Firm fit, good sound, fantastic app
customer_reviews.text: Used but described as Not Refurbished- looked brand new to me!!! 1/2 price, sweet deal- great headphones, decent sound, fantastic fitness app- works well. Firm fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ciaran O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter...loves them. In the past she has owned Beats & Bose. By far her favorite!
customer_reviews.author: TD Carrigan

customer_reviews.title: They were working great but now they're not.
customer_reviews.text: I've had my Jabra Sport Pulse's for about 3 months and they were working fine and I was very pleased with them until a few days ago when all of a sudden the left ear lost sound. I have not exposed them to water or any other action that would cause them to malfunction so I'm not sure what happened. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Scott

customer_reviews.title: Ear fit could be better, battery life and sound quality just a little ...
customer_reviews.text: They work and I would buy again. Product could use a slight improvement. Ear fit could be better, battery life and sound quality just a little off to give it five stars. There really is nothing out on the market that competes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Langley

customer_reviews.title: Goo product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife's birthday she loves them uses them at work and while working out. A charge lay the full day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. He uses them for working out and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Koubek

customer_reviews.title: Sound isn't as loud as the Jaybirds but trust me its more comfortable and more direct with clear sounds
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Jaybirds but had issues with ear fitting...wanted to test out the Jabra and I must say that its held up to its standard...Sound isn't as loud as the Jaybirds but trust me its more comfortable and more direct with clear sounds....I also found out that the battery last longer then Jaybirds...some reason after a two hours of usage , the next following day I only have about 15% on it left..
customer_reviews.author: Fabrice

customer_reviews.title: This product is great for the first months
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for the first months. I have had three of them and none have worked after two months. There is a problem with the reliability of the battery. All three times the battery died and have not been able to recharge again. I have decided never to buy a Jabra product again. I do not have time to be dealing with returns.
customer_reviews.author: Erich

customer_reviews.title: First of all, this is an uncomfortable Earbud. ...
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this is an uncomfortable Earbud. More importantly, the heart rate functionality only works for a few seconds and then stops. It could also do with more volume.
customer_reviews.author: O. Khouri

customer_reviews.title: Avoid it
customer_reviews.text: It's a hassle to charge its battery. The heart monitor never paired with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ying-Hong Li

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping these were going to work. The HRM feature is spotty and some days I am registering 180 BPM and other days I am falling into the 85 range. They do not seem to be consistent monitoring heart rate. They also block out all noise. I had a motorcycle approach from behind and never heard it. If I run on the street I only wear the one ear. While they do have great sound quality if in the gym, they are a hazard running in traffic and the HRM is not worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Compumomma

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: nice software. I like seeing the analysis of my runs. Sometimes, the music cuts out for a split second. Not sure as to why. It comes with several ear bud sizes. This is great because my ears are really mall. I do not even notice the ear buds on my long (2 hour) runs. I definitely recommend this product to people.
customer_reviews.author: R. Earl

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and integrates well w/ Android phones
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and integrates well w/ Android phones. Compared the HRM w/ the machines at the gym and it was either the same or within 1-2 BPM which is good enough for my usage.
customer_reviews.author: OC_V

customer_reviews.title: item would not charge
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these ear buds. I use a Jabra headset at work and love it! However, the item would not charge right out of the box. I am returning it but am very hesitant at trying another pair. Definitely watch out before purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: The headphones and heart rate monitor themselves work good. The software that comes with it is very ...
customer_reviews.text: It's really a 4 star product but for the price I might make it a 3 star. The headphones and heart rate monitor themselves work good. The software that comes with it is very buggy and problematic. It'll pair up with any running/fitness app that I've tried though so I use it with Strava.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D.

customer_reviews.title: Mine broke too
customer_reviews.text: I've been bitten by the same issue: device won't turn on any longer. I've had it for less than three months and it's dead. Not acceptable. I was trying to buy a high end product but now I just have garbage.
customer_reviews.author: LinksAwakener

customer_reviews.title: Not recommanded
customer_reviews.text: first the pulse did not work, then eventually the pulse started to work, then there was no longer sound
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kanner

customer_reviews.title: If they had the loop that went around the ear completely it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.text: i still have issues with getting these to fit correctly in my ears. They always fall out when i am running on the treadmill and that is with the smalles ear piece in. If they had the loop that went around the ear completely it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: theld7

customer_reviews.title: Sucks. Got a brand new pair and having to ...
customer_reviews.text: Sucks. Got a brand new pair and having to send back bc it won't hold charge. Edit: Returned first pair... second set same freaking thing... tech support answer was "upgrade firmware" Surprise (to no one) that didn't fix. Garbage... Refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The headphones came with a full package as original and ...
customer_reviews.text: The headphones came with a full package as original and everything still very new. However, it DOESN'T WORK AT ALL. I pressed the power button for several times but the device's never turn on. I thought it run out of battery, so I charged it for 2.5 hours and tried to turn it on again. IT DOESN'T WORK, too. The headphone, basically, is dead. Now, I have to return it and order another one. Waist of time.
customer_reviews.author: Tien N.

customer_reviews.title: At Last
customer_reviews.text: Better than iSport, Bose, Yurbuds or Bluebuds. Tried them all and Jabra is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these. You can use them all the time. Wish the battery lasted longer
customer_reviews.author: MIndy Petty

customer_reviews.title: Max intensity workout showing as light effort.
customer_reviews.text: Could never get heart rate monitor to work accurately. Even did update to software, tried all the ear buds, wings, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Hurry Hurry

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great! Sounds amazing. No problems thus far. I love how it fits into my ears and when i go running it stays in completely-no adjustments needed. great sound - although it is a slight bit towards the bass, but i don't mind that, i'm not mastering music in the studio. and its amazing how it reads your heart rate and gives you feedback on your performance. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mehran Jabbari

customer_reviews.title: Nice moniters, I bought the first generation
customer_reviews.text: Nice moniters, I bought the first generation. Loses my heart rate pass 180 bpm, not sure if that's a defect or a built cap.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Heilman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is good, but price for shipping to india is too high
customer_reviews.author: Srinivas Reddy

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with these
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have seen a few complaints about sound quality but feel the sound is good enough for me while I'm at the gym. I really like no being tied to my phone (wireless) and am getting a more accurate reading for my heartrate than I ever did with a strap and a watch. It has more features with less stuff to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasts less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: The battery is good for about 6 months of regular use. My first pair worked for about 5 months. Jabra replaced them. The second pair quit after 7 months. When they work they are awesome. Very comfortable. Bluetooth connects quickly. For the price they should last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, heart rate monitor works like a charm but low quality cable
customer_reviews.text: Love it, the only thing i didn't like so much it's that the cable feels cheap. So it gives you the sensation that it's going to break
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Baqueiro Castillo

customer_reviews.title: The Battery life on these headphone was terrible. I usually would get 20-30 minutes before I ...
customer_reviews.text: The Battery life on these headphone was terrible. I usually would get 20-30 minutes before I received a low battery warning. This contunued for a month and then they stopped working entirely. Of course this happened just outside of the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst Quality Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Worst headphones I've ever boughten. Never would hold a full charge and when "fully" charged, wouldn't last a 2 hour exercise period. Now they are completely dead, will not charge at all, no indeicator light! Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Mike Granese

customer_reviews.title: Its own native app Tabra Pulse is great, but not as versatile as mi Coach
customer_reviews.text: It's been a few weeks and I am now getting used to the specifics, most importantly charge every night, turn off when not used, and keep the silicone cap in safe place while charging. What Ilike the most is that is works with my preferred app Adidas miCoach. Its own native app Tabra Pulse is great, but not as versatile as mi Coach. Sound quality is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Stefka Yancheva

customer_reviews.title: In ear fit a little cumbersome
customer_reviews.text: It maybe my ears, but it took me a while to get the right fit and when I finally got it right, I noticed some soreness in my ears after wearing it for a while. Also, I experienced break ups in the music while running...
customer_reviews.author: J Cortina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound is better then my Powerbeats and my wife loves using them in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelis Rillen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift my hubby loves loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ocean

customer_reviews.title: Billp
customer_reviews.text: Calls broke up the first couple of time I tried to use it.
customer_reviews.author: William Parks

customer_reviews.title: what a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The battery lasted for 2 months and the second one dead after 4 months. 300+ dollars in the trash can. what a joke!!! will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY!!!
customer_reviews.text: My first pair failed, and the replacement pair Jabra sent me interrupts regularly while running. They have provided me no real resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dead!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived dead! Packing was intact. Makes you wonder about their QA!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. I wish the range was a little greater, but I'm glad I have it.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Stowers

customer_reviews.title: These are the best blutooth headphones I have used so far
customer_reviews.text: These are the best blutooth headphones I have used so far. I bought the regular Jabra blutooth unit twice and within 1 month they no longer worked.I guess I sweat to much while I run. These fit well and stay in my ear. I do not use the HR monitor as I use Garmin for that. If these had a little more base or built in equalizer I would give 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Mark McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Loved the way they fit in my ear very secure ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved the way they fit in my ear very secure but I hated how quiet they are the max volume isn't loud enough
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ear buds work great, shipped right on time, no issue. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: international warranty service
customer_reviews.text: anybody can help me because when i received it its not working and i want to return but unfortunately i was traveling this months or can if you can send me the international warranty so i can able to send it to the maintenance center in saudi arabia
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best ear buds on the market. These things are amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: mzginao

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product, Great Results. My jabra sport pulse is great it works perfectly and is easy to use the key to having success with this product is to make sure you get a snug fit with the eartips and wings. Jabra made a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of headphones I've ever purchased. I've used them running long distances, doing crossfit, or even swinging a golf club. Great job Jabra!
customer_reviews.author: J R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not very loud, unacceptable sound quality. Looks great
customer_reviews.text: The issue is the sound quality. If I am going to pay 200, and the device is only going to get 5 hours to a charge, the sound quality should be at least comparable to a $30 pair of wired inner ears. I am returning these and getting MEElectronics Air-Fi® Metro2.
customer_reviews.author: JNix90s

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE HEADPHONES
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth the money. Sound is incredibly good, not just for bluetooth but for in ear headphones in general. They fit in your ear perfectly and won't fall out no matter how much you run, jump or lift. My workouts just got a whole lot better!
customer_reviews.author: Joonas Juho Viljami Salonen

customer_reviews.title: The sound is awesome, battery life is amazing
customer_reviews.text: The sound is awesome, battery life is amazing. I've been using these now for several months and I've been impressed at their durability! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Delewsky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these for tracking. The sound is awesome. Still working on the just right fit, though.
customer_reviews.author: Ines Prine

customer_reviews.title: Good in-ear fit
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous. Good in-ear fit, good sound, great app. Just one complaint - start hurting the ear a bit after some time. But still great product.

customer_reviews.title: but not great. Battery life is shorter than advertised and sound ...
customer_reviews.text: Adequate, but not great. Battery life is shorter than advertised and sound quality is so so.

customer_reviews.title: Fails after a few uses during a workout. Once ...
customer_reviews.text: Fails after a few uses during a workout. Once it fails, it no longer will recharge. I have returned it three times.

customer_reviews.title: much better than expected sound
customer_reviews.text: much better than expected sound. They worked great for three weeks then quit. I exchanged for new pair and the new pair is holding up good. The heart rate monitor is very accurate when it is sitting in your ear correctly.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Very good on first couple weeks. but the battery life started to have shorter life after each use. And now, after 6 months do not recharge anymore.

customer_reviews.text: I like them they are comfortable and don't block outside sound, but the music is breaking when i put the phone in a pouch on my hip. quite annoying.

product_meta.title: Jabra Sport Pulse Wireless Bluetooth Stereo Headset with Built-In Heart Rate Monitor
product_meta.description: Color:BlackTake your training to the next level with Jabra Sport Pulse Wireless, the most accurate wireless headset with a built-in heart rate monitor. A precision biometric in-ear heart rate monitor and advanced Jabra Sport Life application ensure you're always training in the correct zone. The Sport Life app provides personalized audio coaching every step of the way and lets you control your music and your training from a single source. Sport Pulse Wireless earbuds are built to provide high quality audio via Dolby enhanced sound and take a beating because they're sweat and weather-proof towards US Military Standards. Sport Pulse Wireless offers a light and ultra-secure fit so you can focus on your workout without distractions. Cut the clutter and experience true wireless freedom of movement including in-line controls for calls and music.
feature_bullets: Wireless Sports earbuds with Dolby sound enhancement and biometric built-in heart rate monitor
Jabra SPORT LIFE application to calibrate for an optimal fit & heart rate measurement, as well as integrated training management and three sophisticated fitness tests
Control music and calls directly from the headphones in-line controls
IP55 Certified, drop, strength, dirt, temperature & humidity tested - US Military Standard
Works with most popular fitness applications on iOS and Android devices to provide pace and distance alerts

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.0 out of 5 stars572 ratings3.0 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Music, Bluetooth, Heart monitor, Fitness tracker, Voice call
specifications.Included Components: Jabra Sport Pulse Wireless Bluetooth Stereo Earbuds With Built-In Heart Rate Monitor, 3-Earwings, 4-Eargels, Fitclip For Perfect Fit
